column4: FTP is insecure.  SSH offers adequate file transfer support via scp and sftp.  It's worth looking into...
...but I'm sure there are graphical ones out there.
From a windows box, you can use winscp.
I don't need graphical, I'll try that one. what's package name - sftp?
ok, I'll try sftp. thank you
WinSCP is a windows client that supports scp, sftp, etc. in case you need to transfer files using a windows box.
It's what my clients use to access their content on my server.
dug: thank you both. If I stuck somwhere I'll contact channel.
